$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint.title: $:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint
$:/language/Buttons/ListBullet2/Hint.text: Apply 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection

$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/readme
$:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button/readme.text:
A button ({{$:/core/images/list-bullet2}}) that applies 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2}} You can apply 2nd level bulleted list formating to * plain text * bulleted lists
